response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if there's any way we can further discuss to reach an agreement that suits both of us.", "product_price": 12000}
